item.description: Well, here we are, and here we go again. Nothing lasts forever. Nothing I do lasts for more than a month. So, here I am with the hopes this one will last longer, like, maybe two months? Anyway, cheers to a new beginning!

#/bin/env bash
echo "To be or not to be."
echo "That's the question."
“To be or not to be, that is the question.” But is it? What if the question is “do you want coffee?” instead? Aha!

A simple test. Yes, simple.

echo "hello world"

This will go to Google , and it is external. Inline code, that’s bananas!

And this is a blockquote, yeah:

“If wisdom ways you wisely seek,
Five things observe with care:
To whom you speak, of whom you speak, and how, when, and where.”

Numbered list work too, nicely styled.

  1. One two and three.
  2. Three two and one.

So do bulleted lists, yeah baby, yeah!

  • Yes and no.
  • No and yes.
Beware!
